text.name: longdescription
text.text: It is the successor to PlayStation 2, and is part of the PlayStation brand of consoles. CPU 3.2 GHz Cell Broadband Engine with 1 PPE and 8 SPEs, 20-500GB, RAM 256MB, 550 MHz Nvidia/SCEI RSX Reality Synthesizer. Release date JP: 11 Nov '06 NA: 17 Nov '06 EU: 23 Mar '07.
